players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Bob: "I have an alibi for the night of Diana's death. I was seen by Alice during that time."
Charlie: "Bob is lying about his alibi. I have no reason to believe Alice would lie."
